languages.text: {n}В голосе женщины звучит равнодушие.{/n} "Он был мудр, но стар, дитя иного сезона. Пока было его время, Конгрегация почитала его, затем время ушло, и он ушел с ним. Принес себя в жертву, отдался еретикам на растерзание. Мы чтим преданность, но мы — иное поколение. Мы рождены для жатвы. Наше восхождение — свершившийся факт".

{n}The woman's voice is indifferent.{/n} "He was wise but old, a child of a different season. While it was his time, the Congregation honoured him, and then his time passed, and he went with it. He sacrificed himself, gave himself up to the heretics to be torn apart. We praise his devotion, but we are of a different generation. We were born for the Reaping. Our ascension is assured."

Принес себя в жертву, отдался еретикам на растерзание. Мы чтим преданность, но мы — иное поколение. Мы рождены для жатвы. Наше восхождение — свершившийся факт".

languages.text: {n}La voz de la mujer es indiferente.{/n} «Era sabio, pero viejo; un hijo de otra temporada. En su tiempo, su congregación le honró, y, cuando su tiempo pasó, se marchó con él. Se sacrificó. Se entregó a los herejes para que lo destrozaran. Ensalzamos su devoción, pero pertenecemos a otra generación. Nacimos de la Siega. Nuestro ascenso está asegurado».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice is indifferent.{/n} "He was wise but old, a child of a different season. While it was his time, the Congregation honoured him, and then his time passed, and he went with it. He sacrificed himself, gave himself up to the heretics to be torn apart. We praise his devotion, but we are of a different generation. We were born for the Reaping. Our ascension is assured."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de la mujer es indiferente.{/n} «Era sabio, pero viejo; un hijo de otra temporada. En su tiempo, le honramos, y, cuando su tiempo pasó, se marchó con él. Se sacrificó. Se entregó a los herejes para que lo destrozaran. Ensalzamos su devoción, pero pertenecemos a otra generación. Nacimos de la Siega. Nuestro ascenso está asegurado».

Se entregó a los herejes para que lo destrozaran. Ensalzamos su devoción, pero pertenecemos a otra generación. Nacimos de la Siega. Nuestro ascenso está asegurado».

languages.text: {n}女の声は淡々としている。{/n}「彼は賢いけれども、歳だったのだ。別の季節の子供なのだ。彼の時代では、教団は彼を称えた。時代が過ぎて、彼は時代と共に行ったのだ。彼は自らを犠牲にし、異端者に身を委ね、引き裂かれた。その献身を称えるが、私たちとは世代が違う。私たちは刈り取るために生まれた。昇華できるのは確実だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice is indifferent.{/n} "He was wise but old, a child of a different season. While it was his time, the Congregation honoured him, and then his time passed, and he went with it. He sacrificed himself, gave himself up to the heretics to be torn apart. We praise his devotion, but we are of a different generation. We were born for the Reaping. Our ascension is assured."

languages.text: {n}女人的声音无比冷漠。{/n}“他很贤明，但他年事已高，是源自另一个时代的子嗣。当我们身处他的时代时，所有教众都很尊重他。而在那之后，他的时代结束了，他也随之而去。他牺牲了自己，将自己献给了异端分子，让那些人将他撕碎。我们赞美他的牺牲，但我们来自另一个时代。我们为收割而生，我们将注定获得擢升。”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice is indifferent.{/n} "He was wise but old, a child of a different season. While it was his time, the Congregation honoured him, and then his time passed, and he went with it. He sacrificed himself, gave himself up to the heretics to be torn apart. We praise his devotion, but we are of a different generation. We were born for the Reaping. Our ascension is assured."

traits.locale_text: {n}女人的声音无比冷漠。{/n}“他很贤明，但他年事已高，是另一个时代的子嗣。当我们身处他的时代时，我们都很尊重他。而在那之后，他的时代结束了，他也随之而去。他牺牲了自己，将自己献给了异端分子，让那些人将他撕碎。我们赞美他的奉献精神，但我们来自另一个时代。我们为收割而生，我们将注定获得擢升。”
{n}女人的声音无比冷漠。{/n}“他很贤明，但他年事已高，是另一个时代的子嗣。当我们身处他的时代时，我们都很尊重他。而在那之后，他的时代结束了，他也随之而去。他牺牲了自己，将自己献给了异端分子，让那些人将他撕碎。我们赞美他的奉献精神，但我们来自另一个时代。我们为收割而生，我们将注定获得擢升。”

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme der Frau ist gleichgültig.{/n} "Er war weise, aber alt, ein Kind einer anderen Jahreszeit. Während seiner Zeit hat ihn die Kongregation geehrt. Dann verging seine Zeit, und er ging mit ihr. Er hat sich selbst geopfert, hat sich den Ketzern hingegeben, auf dass sie ihn zerreißen. Wir preisen seine Hingabe, doch wir entstammen einer anderen Generation. Wir wurden für die Ernte geboren. Unser Aufstieg ist sicher."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice is indifferent.{/n} "He was wise but old, a child of a different season. While it was his time, the Congregation honoured him, and then his time passed, and he went with it. He sacrificed himself, gave himself up to the heretics to be torn apart. We praise his devotion, but we are of a different generation. We were born for the Reaping. Our ascension is assured."

Unser Aufstieg ist sicher."

languages.text: « Il était sage, mais vieux, {n}répond-elle d'une voix indifférente.{/n} C'était un enfant d'une autre époque. La Congrégation l'a honoré pendant son temps, et quand son heure est venue, il s'en est allé. Il s'est sacrifié en se livrant aux hérétiques pour être écartelé. Nous respectons sa dévotion, mais nous sommes d'une autre génération. Nous sommes nés pour la Moisson. Notre ascension est assurée. »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice is indifferent.{/n} "He was wise but old, a child of a different season. While it was his time, the Congregation honoured him, and then his time passed, and he went with it. He sacrificed himself, gave himself up to the heretics to be torn apart. We praise his devotion, but we are of a different generation. We were born for the Reaping. Our ascension is assured."

traits.locale_text: « Il était sage, mais vieux, {n}répond-elle d'une voix indifférente.{/n} C'était un enfant d'une autre époque. Nous l'avons honoré pendant son temps, et quand son heure est venue, il s'en est allé. Il s'est sacrifié en se livrant aux hérétiques pour être déchiré. Nous respectons sa dévotion, mais nous sommes d'une autre génération. Nous sommes nés pour la Moisson. Notre ascension est assurée. »

« Il était sage, mais vieux, {n}répond-elle d'une voix indifférente.{/n} C'était un enfant d'une autre époque. Nous respectons sa dévotion, mais nous sommes d'une autre génération. Nous sommes nés pour la Moisson. Notre ascension est assurée. »

languages.text: {n}Kadının sesinde en ufak duygu bulunmuyor.{/n} "Bilge ama yaşlıydı, farklı bir devrin evladıydı. Cemaat onu onurlandırdı, sonra vakti dolunca göçtü. Kendini feda etti, parçalanmak üzere kâfirlere teslim oldu. Bağlılığından övgülerle bahsetsek de biz farklı bir nesildeniz. Hasat için doğduk. Yükselişimiz kesindir."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice is indifferent.{/n} "He was wise but old, a child of a different season. While it was his time, the Congregation honoured him, and then his time passed, and he went with it. He sacrificed himself, gave himself up to the heretics to be torn apart. We praise his devotion, but we are of a different generation. We were born for the Reaping. Our ascension is assured."
